for predicting.from sentence: In this paper we introduce a new NLP dataset and benchmark for predicting prosodic prominence from text which is based on the recently published Libri TTS corpus , containing automatically generated prosodic prominence labels for over 260 hours or 2.8 million words of English audio books , read by 1230 different speakers .

largest publicly available dataset.from sentence: To our knowledge this will be the largest publicly available dataset with prosodic annotations .
